text.div:
Person-Centered Planning Questions

Question 1 text / type: Did you choose the setting in which you reside? / boolean

Question 2 text / type: What alternative home and community-based settings were considered? string

Question 3 text / type: Were you given a choice of services outlined in the plan? / boolean

Question 4 text / type: Did you participate in the selection of services outlined in the plan? / boolean

Question 5 text / type: Do you agree to the services outlined in the plan? / boolean

Question 6 text / type: Were you offered a choice of providers for each service? / boolean

Question 7 text / type: Do you feel you made an informed choice in selecting the provider for each service? / boolean

item.text: Did you choose the setting in which you reside?
What alternative home and community-based settings were considered?
Were you given a choice of services outlined in the plan?
Did you participate in the selection of services outlined in the plan?
Do you agree to the services outlined in the plan?
Were you offered a choice of providers for each service?
Do you feel you made an informed choice in selecting the provider for each service?
